about_the_game:
Get ready for the ultimate bot battle with CorpoBots! A twin-stick action hack n' slash designed for 4 players, where you can build your own household appliance battle bot, choose your weapons, and advertise your brand by fighting competitor bots in an always changing arena. Fight your way up to the top and become the Boss in an epic battle against your friends!


A wide variety of parts are at your disposal to create your own battle bot!

You'll have access to over 4,000 different bot combinations to build with, providing endless possibilities for customization and creativity. With so many unique combinations to choose from, you'll never run out of ideas or possibilities for your custom bot. Fine-tune your bot's movement, weapons, and abilities to create a fighting machine that perfectly suits your style of play. Whether you prefer to engage in close combat or long-range attacks, you can build a bot that can handle any challenge and emerge victorious on the battlefield.


Engage in battles against bots controlled by your friends in a constantly changing arena!

The constantly changing arena will require you to adapt quickly to new obstacles and terrain as you maneuver around the arena to gain the upper hand. Don't forget to keep an eye on your own defenses, your friends' will be launching their own attacks in an attempt to take you down. With lightning-fast reflexes and strategic planning, you just might emerge victorious in this intense and exciting battle of the bots. Keep an eye out for power-ups and special upgrades that can give you an edge in battle.


Become the Boss, defeat your friends!

Becoming the boss requires you to use your bot effectively. Your skills and strategic planning will pay off when you return to the arena bigger, stronger, and faster. Defeat your friends before they team up in an attempt to destroy your bot first. It's not just about defeating your opponents. It's about proving that you have what it takes to be the ultimate bot. So gather your friends, build your bots, and prepare for an epic battle that will determine who will come out on top!


The CorpoBots Arena is grateful to their megacorporation sponsors for their generous contribution of parts and funding, without which this thrilling and fast-paced bot event would not be possible.

  • Clean Companions, makes vacuums with personality, family friendly and keeping things clean!
  • Mother+, was voted most trusted & loved pre-crime prevention service worldwide 30 years in a row by everyone.
  • Samurai, has been hiding its military contracts under the guise of making blenders and other kitchen appliances Samurai has been the CIA’s go to when it comes to concealed weaponry.
  • Toasty's, gives you the taste the good o' days with their vintage Kitchen Appliances!
  • WALT, gets the job done with efficient construction tools and equipment.

short_description: CorpoBots is the ultimate battle party game! A twin-stick action hack n' slash designed for 4 players, where you build and customize your own bot, choose your weapons, abilities and movement style. If you can make it to the top, become the Boss Bot in an epically hectic battle against your friends!
